name: dodder
description: Dodder is a local AI software development agent that runs from your terminal on top of Ollama.
author: Nikhil Katkuri (https://github.com/NikhilKatkuri)
main: safe/malicious ideas, plans the tech stack, writes a step‑by‑step `dodder_guide.txt`, and then uses tools (filesystem + shell) to scaffold and iteratively refine your project from the CLI.
